posts.post_content:
Nearing the end of my 1911 Obak quest and would like to find a presentable, but not high end 1911 Obak Ten Million.

my email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]
Bump.  Any lower end Millions out there?  The one in the current Goodwin auction is too high grade (ie expensive) for my purposes.
